metadata.title: CVE-2021-3643 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: A flaw was found in sox 14.4.1. The lsx_adpcm_init function within libsox leads to a global-buffer-overflow. This flaw allows an attacker to input a malicious file, leading to the disclosure of sensitive information.

criterions.comment: sox package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
